277154.<pipipi_low><center>無駄なことだ。\n我がチカラは 不滅なり:
<pipipi_low>This is futile. My power is
immortal.

277155.「くそっ 復活しやがった！\n これじゃ ジリ貧だよ マドロック！？:
Damn it, he's back! I'm getting nowhere,
Madlock!

277156.「フレンジー <cs_pchero>！\n ムネにある宝石だ。\n あれを 奴か:
Frenzy <cs_pchero>! The jewels in the munes.
We have to get it off of him!

277160.「なぜ それほどまでに 海賊を憎む……。\n 我々が あんたに 何をした？:
Why do you hate pirates so much... what have
we done to you?

277161.「……しばらく前のことだ。\n 小さな漁村の近くで 海賊どもが争い\n 外れた砲:
It was some time ago. Pirates fought near a
small fishing village, and a stray shell
caused great damage to the fishing village.

277162.「私が駆けつけたときには 海賊どもの姿はなく\n 崩れ落ちた家屋と 多くのケガ人:
By the time I got there, there were no pirates
in sight, only crumbling houses and many
injured persons left on the spot...

277163.「そうか……。我々が ハルバルドから\n 海で奇襲を受けた あのときか……。:
Oh, yes... that time we were ambushed at sea
by Halbard...

277164.「私の弟も そこで 暮らしていたのだ。\n 弟は そのとき 漁に出ていたらしいが:
My brother used to live there. He was out
fishing at the time, but all that was found
were pieces of his fishing boat.

277165.「海賊どもによって 弟は 殺された。\n 私は 弟……ピードの仇を 討たねばなら:
Pirates killed my brother. I must avenge my
brother Peid!

277166.「おい ピードって まさか……。: Hey, Peid? Don't tell me you're...

277167.「ああ。今の話を聞く限り まちがいないな。: Yeah. From what you just said, I'm sure.

277168.「あんたの弟は 死んではいない。\n ピードは 我々の仲間として 暮らしている。:
Your brother is not dead. Peid lives on as one
of us.

277169.「あいつが…… 生きている？\n しかも 海賊として……だと！？\n そんなこと:
He's... alive? And as a pirate? How is that
possible?

277170.「船長！ お宝は どうなりやした？\n およばずながら 加勢に来やしたぜっ。\n:
Captain! What happened to the treasure? I'm
here to help you out, even though I don't know
you. What the hell is this?

277171.「なんで ピードまで 連れてきたんだい。\n 荒事には 巻き込むなって 言ったろ:
Why did you bring Peid here? I told you not to
get involved in any trouble.

277172.「それが……。どうしても 船長の\n お役に立ちたいって ゴネられまして。\n:
But... he insisted on helping the captain. I'm
sorry, Sis.

277174.「いいや。でかしたよ タクホ。\n これで この兄チャンも アタイたちが\n ウ:
No problem. Good job, Takuho. Now my brother
will understand that we're not lying.

277175.「本当に ピードなの……か？\n その格好は 海賊の…………。:
Are you really Peid? You're dressed like a
pirate.

277176.「あのとき 漁に出ていた僕の船は\n 突進してきた 海賊の船に ぶつけられて\n:
I was out fishing when my boat was hit by a
pirate ship that came barreling toward us, and
it was all torn to shreds...

277177.「海に投げ出された後 沈みかけていた僕を\n マドロック海賊団の人が 助けてくれ:
After I was thrown overboard and was about to
sink, a person from the Madlock Pirates
rescued me.

277178.「それで そのまま 居着いてしまったんだ。\n 海賊の暮らしが とても 楽しくて:
And so I stayed. I've been enjoying the pirate
life so much...

277179.「私は 弟の命の恩人を\n この手で 殺すところだったのか…………。:
I almost killed the man who saved my brother's
life with my own hands...

277180.「……ごめんよ ゲーダム兄さん。\n 僕が 無事なことを\n もっと早く 知らせ:
I'm sorry, brother Gedam. I should have let
you know sooner that I was safe.

277181.「僕が 海賊になったなんて 知らせたら\n 兄さんに 迷惑が かかると思って……:
I thought it would be bad for you if I told
you that I had become a pirate...

277182.「いいんだ。お前が 生きていたなら\n それだけで…………。:
It's okay. If you're alive, that's all that
matters...

277183.<pipipi_low><center>……チカラの欠片は ひとつにあらず。\n:
<pipipi_low>...There is more than one piece of
power. Someday, we will appear again. And
then...

277184.「こんな秘宝が 他にもあるということか？\n まったく ゾッとしない話だな……。:
You're telling me there are other treasures
like this out there? That's just horrifying...

277185.「あんたは 秘宝のチカラに惑わされ\n 自分を見失っていただけだ。\n 気に病む:
You were just confused by the power of the
treasure and lost sight of yourself. There is
no need to be concerned.

277186.「それに 非は こちらにもある。\n 漁村の件は 申し訳ないことをした。\n で:
And we're to blame. I'm sorry about what
happened in the fishing village. We will do
our best to make amends.

277187.「……感謝する。私は すべてを 女王に報告し\n この罪を 裁かれなくてはならな:
I thank you. I must report all this to the
queen and be judged for this crime.

277189.「ゲーダム兄さん ありがとう。\n あとで 必ず 会いにいくから！:
Thank you, brother Gedam. I'll be sure to see
you later!

277190.「話も済んだし そろそろ 引き上げないかい？\n 今回ばかりは さすがのアタイも:
Now that we've talked, can't we leave? For once, as expected of me, I'm exhausted. I'd like to go back to the ship and have a good
night's sleep.

277191.「ああ。船に帰ろう。オレたちの家にな。:
Oh. Let's go back to the boat. Back to our
house.

277192.「ああ……。海賊どもが\n また やって来たか…………。: Ah... the pirates are at it again...

277193.「今すぐ 秘宝を捨てろっ。\n そいつの声に 耳を貸すな！！:
Throw away the treasure now! Don't listen to
his voice!

277194.<center><pipipi_low>さあ 我が 怨嗟のチカラを与えよう。\n:
<pipipi_low>Now I will give you the power of
my vindictiveness. Then your wish will be
granted.

277195.<center><pipipi_low>怨讐の念に従い すべてを 滅ぼすがいい。:
<pipipi_low>According to your vengeance,
destroy all. As you wish.

277197.「そうだ！ オレが 滅ぼしてやる。\n 海賊どもを！ 弟を殺した者どもを！！:
Yes! I will destroy them. Pirates! The men who
killed my brother!

277198.「これが 海を支配するチカラの正体……なのか？\n まったく ロクなもんじゃない:
Is this the true nature of the power that
rules the sea? It's absolutely terrible.

277199.「ああ 同感だね。\n こんなもん お宝でも なんでもないよ！: Yeah, I agree. This stuff is nothing!

277200.「オレたちで なんとかするぞ。\n <cs_pchero> フレンジー 抜かるな:
We'll take care of it. <cs_pchero> Frenzy,
don't lose it.

277202.「……くそっ。<cs_pchero>！！\n あれの相手は お前に まかせる！:
...Damn. <cs_pchero>! I'll leave you to deal
with that thing!

277203.「グヒャヒャヒャッ！ いいだろう。\n ひとりずつ じっくりと 滅ぼしてやる。\:
Gwahhhhhh! All right. I'll destroy them one by
one, slowly. Starting with you!

277204.「ゲーダムの旦那ぁ。\n これで ワシだけは\n 見逃してもらえるんだよな？:
Gedam's husband. You'll let me off the hook
for this, won't you?

277205.「海神の秘宝……。なるほど。\n たしかに 大きなチカラを感じる。:
Sea God Wealth... I see. Indeed, I feel its
great power.

277206.「こんなものを 貴様たちが 手にしたら\n 何をしでかすか わかったものじゃない:
I don't know what you would do if you got your
hands on something like this...

277207.「へへっ。それじゃ ワシは この辺で……。: Heh heh. Well then, I'll leave you to it...

277208.「……女王よ。\n こんな卑怯で 恥知らずな海賊どもを\n 生かしておく価値など:
My queen. Where is the value in keeping these
cowardly, shameless pirates alive?

277209.「こんな奴らに 私の弟は 殺されたのだぞ！\n もはや 私は……私は…………。:
These people killed my brother! I am no
longer...

277210.<pipipi_low><center>ああ よいぞ……。\n心地よい 負の感情:
<pipipi_low> Oh, good ... fill me with
comforting negative emotions.

277211.<pipipi_low><center>そなたの望み。\n我がチカラで 応えよう:
<pipipi_low>Your wish. I will respond with my
power...

277212.「なっ なんだ これは……！？\n うぎゃああああぁぁっ！！: What the hell is this...! Aaahhh!

277213.「ククク……。\n このチカラがあれば 私は…………。: Kukuku... with this power, I can...

277214.<pipipi_low><center>あわてることはない……。\nみずからの手:
<pipipi_low>Don't panic... take matters into
your own hands.

277215.<pipipi_low><center>そなたに 我がチカラの一端を与える。\n:
<pipipi_low>I give you a piece of my power.
Now... head for the Ship Graveyard. Let the
ritual begin.

277216.「こいつは ヤバいことになった。\n やはり あの秘宝は 危険なシロモノだ。:
This is a bad thing. After all, that treasure
is a dangerous thing.

277217.「でも 放っとけないだろ？\n アイツは 海賊に 恨みがあったみたいだ。\n こ:
But you can't just leave him there, can you?
He's got a grudge against pirates. If we don't
do something...

277219.「あれを 野放しにするわけには いかない。\n <pc>。チカラを貸してくれるか:
We can't let it go unchecked. <pc>.
Will you help us?<yesno><close>

277220.「おいおい。怖気づいちまったのかい？\n ここで 退くわけにゃいかないだろ！:
Hey, hey, hey. You're scared now, aren't you?
You can't back out now!

277221.「お前のチカラが 必要と判断したんだ。\n <pc>。やってくれるな？<yesn:
I've decided I need your help. <pc>.
Will you do it?<yesno><close>

277222.「おっ ヤる気だね <pc>。\n そうこなくっちゃね！:
Oh, you're going to do it <pc>.
That's what I'm talking about!

277223.「戦いは 避けられないだろう。\n このまま 突入するのは 危険だ。\n いった:
A fight is inevitable. It's not safe to go in
like this. We'd better get ready.

277224.「よし。じゃあ 準備ができたら\n 秘密の部屋の先の 船の墓場に\n 突入ってこ:
Alright. Then when you're ready, we'll go into
the Ship Graveyard at the end of the secret
room, please <pc>!

277225.「やるな <pc>。\n オレたちより先に お宝まで\n たどり着くとは 思わな:
Nice work, <pc>. I didn't think you'd
get to the treasure before we did.

277227.「ふんふん。ワナは ないようだね。\n いいかい？ 開けちまうよ！！:
Hmmm. I don't see any traps. Ready? I'm gonna
open it!

277228.「こいつは……。\n これが 海神の秘宝……なのか？: Is this... is this the Sea God Wealth?

277229.「とんでもなく 嫌な予感がしやがる。\n こいつは そっとしておくべきじゃないか:
I have a very bad feeling about this.
Shouldn't we leave this guy alone?

277230.「はあ！？ 何 言ってるんだい。\n アタイたちは ずっと 探してたんじゃないか:
Huh? What are you saying? Me and my friends
have been looking for this thing for a long
time. The one with the power to rule the sea!

277231.「仮に そんなチカラが なくたって\n こんだけのお宝だ。売りゃ いい金になる。:
Even if you don't have that kind of power,
it's still a treasure. Selling it would be
good money. You can fix the boat in no time!

277232.「……放置して 他の誰かの手に\n 渡ってしまうのも やっかいか。\n オレたち:
It would be a problem if we leave it and it
ends up in someone else's hands. I think it's
better if we keep it...

277233.「いいね。この重み……。\n これこそ お宝の重みってヤツだよ。:
I like it. This weight... This is what I call
the weight of a treasure.

277234.「よっしゃ 船に戻ろうじゃないか。\n コイツを みんなにも 見せてやらないとね:
All right, let's get back to the ship. We've
got to show this thing to everybody!

277235.「<pc>。お前は オレが 思ってた以上に\n ウデは立つし 頼りにもなるようだ:
<pc>. You seem to be more skilled and
dependable than I thought you would be. I'll
be expecting more from you in the future.

286840.「船長サンが ハルバルドにばかり かまって\n 宝の地図は どうでもいいって態度:
If Captain Halbard wasn't so preoccupied with
the treasure map, we would have been here much
sooner.

286841.「アタイだって あんな ヘタクソな芝居をして\n ハルバルドに取り入る必要も な:
Me, too, I didn't have to put on such a bad
act to get in Halbard's good graces. But you
know what? It's already past.
